short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the progress of the day, week, month, and year along with a daily journal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time & Mood Tracker - Your Personalized Daily Journal and Progress Monitor!

Transform your new tab into a powerful tool for self-reflection and productivity with the Time & Mood Tracker extension.

üìù Features:

New Tab Dashboard: Every time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted with a personalized dashboard showing your daily progress, journal prompts, and mood tracker.
Journal Entries: Record daily gratitude, what made your day great, and areas for improvement. Your thoughts are securely saved locally for each day.
Mood Tracker: Track your mood with simple emojis and view your average mood over the past 30 days.
Progress Bars: Visualize your progress through the day, week, month, and year with easy-to-read circular progress bars.
Inspirational Quotes: Receive a new motivational quote every time you open a new tab to inspire your day.
Whether you want to stay motivated, track your emotional well-being, or maintain a daily journal, this extension keeps it all organized in your new tab.
